pages.text: Iridium is a new metal added by Terramity.$(br2)Iridium is used for hellspec alloy, void alloy, and conductite smithing templates.$(br2)Iridium ore can be found deep in any dimension, and can only be mined by a dimlite, cosmilite, or virentium pickaxe.

pages.title: Iridium
pages.text: Iridium is a great base for strong alloys.
